{{Wired embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=ESPRESSObin |revision=v7 |asin=B07KTMBCS1 |price=69 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Currently Shipping |est_release_date=12/2018 |fcc_date=11/18/2020 |fcc_id=YCJ-ESPRESSOBIN |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F3720 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25U3235FM2I-100 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K512M16HA-107 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J2 |serial=yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6341 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific;PL2303SA;;1;,,, Dual BiDirectional I2C/SMBus V-Level Translator;NXP;PCA9306;;1;,,, 3A 1.5MHz Synchro Step-Down Regulator;Feeling Technology;FP6165;;6;,,, 4-bit Dual Supply Translating Transceiver;Nexperia;74AVC4T245;;1;,,, 6A 23V 500kHz Synchronous Buck Converter;Richtek;RT6220;;1;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;uPI Semi;uP8809P;;1;,,, 12V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Vishay;Si6913DQ;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.03; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.52; |tp_firmware=Armbian |oui_eth=F0:AD:4E }}
:[https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ Product page] {{•}} [http://espressobin.net/ Support page]
"ESPRESSObin_V7_0-2" is silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|GlobalScale Devices|GlobalScale}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F3720 @1.2GHz :Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) SDRAM *Storage: MicroSD (TF) Card slot, :SATA 3.0, eMMC (optional) *Network: 3x 1Gb Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0 ports *GPIO: 2x 46-pin headers *Power Source: 12V/2A via DC power
===Models=== :;SD-WAN/CPE *[[GlobalScale MOCHAbin]] • [[Marvell]] Quad Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/mochabin-copy/ PPage] *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin Ultra]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin-ultra/ PPage] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/globalscale/globalscale_espressobin-ultra ToH] :FCC ID: YCJULTRA (2020-03-26) ''Globalscale Technologies Inc.''
:;Edge Gateways, Firewall and SBC *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin v5]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ PPage] *[[GlobalScale ESPRESSObin v7]] • [[Marvell]] Dual Core SoC • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/espressobin/ PPage] :FCC ID: YCJ-ESPRESSOBIN (2020-11-18) ''Globalscale Technologies Inc.'' *[[GlobalScale Sheeva64]] • [[GlobalScale Sheeva64 WiFi]] • [https://globalscaletechnologies.com/product/sheeva-64/ PPage] *[[SolidRun MACCHIATObin DoubleShot]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/marvell/marvell_macchiatobin OpenWrt wiki] __NOTOC__
